entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
